item.title: 独家报道消息人士称英伟达为中国修改H20芯片以克服美国出口管制
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，在美国对原始型号的人工智能芯片实施出口限制后，英伟达计划在未来两个月内面向中国发布其 H20 人工智能芯片的降级版本。【原文：Nvidia plans to release a downgraded version of its H20 artificial intelligence chip for China in the next two months, following U.S. export restrictions on the original model, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道：明星健康》黑客称他们向印度高管发出死亡威胁和子弹
item.description: 去年泄露印度医疗保险公司 Star Health 所掌握的敏感个人数据的黑客已对向该公司首席执行官和财务主管发送死亡威胁和子弹的行为负责。【原文：The hacker who leaked sensitive personal data held by Indian health insurer Star Health last year has taken responsibility for sending death threats and bullets to the company's chief executive and finance head.】

item.title: 中国 4 月进出口均超预期
item.description: 周五的海关数据显示，中国4月份出口增长快于预期，而进口降幅收窄，这在本周末与美国进行破冰关税谈判之前给中国政府带来了一些宽慰。【原文：China's exports rose faster than expected in April, while imports narrowed their declines, customs data showed on Friday, giving Beijing some relief ahead of ice-breaker tariff talks with the U.S. this weekend.】

item.title: 中国 4 月出口好于预期，进口降幅收窄
item.description: 周五的海关数据显示，中国4月份出口同比增长8.1%，进口萎缩0.2%，均未达到贸易大幅放缓的预期。【原文：China's exports expanded 8.1% year-on-year in April, while imports contracted 0.2%, customs data showed on Friday, both defying expectations for a much sharper slowdown in trade.】

item.title: 中国称对美国处理贸易问题的能力充满信心
item.description: 中国外交部副部长华春莹周五表示，中国对其管理美国贸易问题的能力充满信心，此前一天，中美双方官员将在瑞士举行会议，讨论彼此加征关税的问题。【原文：China has full confidence in its ability to manage U.S. trade issues, Vice Foreign Minister Hua Chunying said on Friday, a day before officials from both sides are set to meet in Switzerland to discuss the tariffs they have imposed on each other.】

item.title: 日本股市跳涨，美元因贸易希望而走强；比特币飙升
item.description: 美国与英国达成的贸易协议燃起了日本与其他国家的关税谈判取得进展的希望，受美元兑日元大涨的支撑，日本股市周五跳涨。【原文：Japanese stocks jumped on Friday, supported by the dollar's surge against the yen, after a U.S. trade deal with Britain fuelled hopes of progress in tariff talks with other countries.】

item.title: 中美贸易会议前油价变化不大
item.description: 周五早盘，油价变化不大，上一交易日上涨超过3%，原因是主要石油消费国美国和中国之间的贸易紧张局势出现缓和迹象，而且英国宣布与美国达成一项 "突破性 "贸易协议。【原文：Oil prices were little changed early on Friday after rising more than 3% in the previous session, as trade tension between top oil consumers U.S. and China showed signs of easing and Britain announced a "breakthrough" trade deal with the United States.】

item.title: 消息人士称，贝恩资本将出售中国数据中心业务，估值可能超过 40 亿美元
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，美国投资公司贝恩资本正在寻求出售数据中心运营商WinTriX DC集团在中国的业务，交易价值可能超过40亿美元。【原文：U.S. investment firm Bain Capital is seeking to sell the China business of data centre operator WinTriX DC Group, in a deal that could value the business at over $4 billion, two people with knowledge of the situation said.】

item.title: 中芯国际联合首席执行官表示将密切关注关税对需求的影响
item.description: 中国半导体代工企业--中芯国际集成电路制造有限公司（SMIC）联席首席执行官赵海军周五表示，将密切关注关税对需求的影响，并补充说目前尚不清楚第二季度的情况。【原文：China's semiconductor foundry, Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corporation (SMIC), will closely monitor the impact of tariffs on demand, co-CEO Zhao Haijun said on Friday, adding that visibility for the second quarter was not clear at the moment.】

item.title: 进入中美贸易谈判，美元有望实现周线上涨
item.description: 周五，美元兑大多数主要同业货币实现周度上涨，原因是美英贸易协议提高了人们对即将举行的中美谈判取得进展的希望，而在美联储表示不急于降息后，人们对美国即将降息的押注有所减弱。【原文：The dollar headed for a weekly gain on most major peers on Friday as a U.S.-UK trade deal raised hopes of progress in looming U.S.-China talks, while bets of imminent U.S. rate cuts receded after the Federal Reserve indicated it was in no hurry.】

item.title: 消息称 Hellman & Friedman 启动出售美国软件制造商 Enverus 的程序
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Hellman & Friedman 已经启动了对总部位于得克萨斯州的能源软件制造商 Enverus 的出售程序，该交易可能会使该公司的估值达到 60 亿美元左右。【原文：Private equity firm Hellman & Friedman has launched a sale process for Texas-based energy software maker Enverus in a deal that could value the company at around $6 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国房地产公司 CoStar 将以 19 亿美元收购澳大利亚 Domain 公司
item.description: 澳大利亚 Domain 控股公司周五表示，美国在线房地产公司 CoStar 将收购这家房地产分类公司，隐含企业价值为 30 亿澳元（19.2 亿美元）。【原文：Australia's Domain Holdings said on Friday U.S. online real estate firm CoStar would acquire the property classifieds company for an implied enterprise value of A$3 billion ($1.92 billion).】

item.title: 日产放弃耗资 11 亿美元在日本南部建造电动汽车电池厂的计划
item.description: 日产汽车周五表示，将放弃在日本西南部九州岛建造一座耗资 11 亿美元的电动汽车电池工厂的计划，这标志着这家陷入困境的汽车制造商的计划发生了最新变化。【原文：Nissan Motor said on Friday it would abandon a plan to build a $1.1 billion factory for electric vehicle batteries on Japan's southwestern island of Kyushu, marking the latest change of plans for the troubled automaker.】

item.title: 日本 3 月实际工资连续第三个月下降，加班费减少
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，在通胀持续高企的背景下，日本 3 月份实际工资连续第三个月下降，加班工资的下降速度为近一年来最快。【原文：Japanese real wages decreased for a third consecutive month in March against the background of relentless inflation, while overtime salaries fell at the fastest pace in almost a year, government data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 新闻集团季度业绩超出预期，得益于道琼斯和数字房地产服务部门的增长
item.description: 受道琼斯业务和在线房地产服务增长的推动，新闻集团周四公布的第三季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，股价在延时交易中上涨约 3%。【原文：News Corp beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue and profit on Thursday, driven by growth in its Dow Jones business and online real estate services, sending its shares up about 3% in extended trading.】

item.title: Microchip 预测第一季度利润和收入高于预期
item.description: 芯片制造商微芯科技（Microchip Technology）继周四公布乐观的第四季度收入后，预计第一季度收入和利润将高于预期，这表明市场对其芯片的需求正在复苏。【原文：Chipmaker Microchip Technology forecast first-quarter revenue and profit above estimates following an upbeat fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday, signaling a recovery in demand for its chips.】

item.title: 怪物饮料因需求不振，季度净销售额意外下滑
item.description: 怪物饮料公司（Monster Beverage）周四公布的第一季度收入意外下降，表明在经济不确定的情况下，美国消费者减少了对价格昂贵的能量饮料的消费。【原文：Monster Beverage reported a surprise fall in first-quarter revenue on Thursday, signaling consumers in the U.S. pared back spending on pricey energy drinks amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 澳大利亚麦格理全年利润增长近 5
item.description: 周五，澳大利亚麦格理公司（Macquarie）发布公告称，受资产管理部门业绩费用增加的推动，全年利润增长近 5%。【原文：Australia's Macquarie posted a nearly 5% rise in its full-year profit on Friday, driven by increased performance fees recorded by its asset management segment.】

item.title: 美国商务部长称下月将推出数十项贸易协议
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周四对 CNBC 表示，华盛顿将在未来一个月内推出数十项贸易协议，但对大多数国家征收的 10%关税可能会继续保留。【原文：Washington will roll out dozens of trade deals over the next month, but a 10% tariff imposed on most countries will likely stay, U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick told CNBC on Thursday】

item.title: Wolfspeed 2026 年收入低于预期，股价下滑
item.description: 周四，芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 预测 2026 年收入低于华尔街预期，并公布第三季度收入下降 7%，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 11%。【原文：Chipmaker Wolfspeed forecast 2026 revenue below Wall Street estimates and reported a 7% decline in third-quarter revenue on Thursday, sending its shares down 11% in extended trading.】

item.title: 生产成本上升，MP 材料公司转为季度亏损
item.description: 美国稀土生产商 MP Materials 公司周四表示，尽管业绩符合投资者预期，但部分由于生产成本上升和利息支出增加，该公司第一季度出现亏损。【原文：U.S. rare earths producer MP Materials said on Thursday that it swung to a first-quarter loss due in part to rising production costs and interest expenses, though results met investors' expectations.】

item.title: 尽管第一季度业绩不佳，Nutrien 仍看好化肥行业前景
item.description: 尽管周三晚间发布的第一季度业绩令人失望，但 Nutrien 在周四的分析师电话会议上对 2025 年全球化肥市场前景表示看好。【原文：Nutrien offered a bullish outlook for the 2025 global fertilizer market in an analyst call on Thursday, despite issuing disappointing first-quarter results on Wednesday night.】

item.title: 交易日 关税紧张局势降温，市场热闹非凡
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司第一季度亏损扩大，原因是乘客放弃美国旅行
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）周四公布的第一季度亏损扩大，原因是在两国贸易关系紧张的情况下，其主要美国市场的客运量下降。【原文：Air Canada reported a wider first-quarter loss on Thursday, owing to weaker passenger traffic to its key U.S. market amid strained trade relations between the two countries.】

item.title: Celsius 创始人亚历克斯-马辛斯基（Alex Mashinsky）因加密货币欺诈被判 12 年监禁
item.description: 破产加密货币贷款公司 Celsius Network 的创始人兼前首席执行官亚历克斯-马辛斯基（Alex Mashinsky）在 12 月承认犯有证券欺诈和商品欺诈罪，周四被判处 12 年监禁。【原文：Alex Mashinsky, the founder and former chief executive of bankruptcy cryptocurrency lender Celsius Network, was sentenced on Thursday to 12 years in prison after pleading guilty in December to securities fraud and commodities fraud.】

item.title: 芭比娃娃制造商美泰聘请 Kenvue 的 Paul Ruh 担任首席财务官
item.description: 美泰周四任命消费保健巨头 Kenvue 的 Paul Ruh 为首席财务官，接替 Anthony DiSilvestro。【原文：Mattel on Thursday named consumer health giant Kenvue's Paul Ruh as CFO, replacing Anthony DiSilvestro.】

item.title: 独家报道卡夫亨氏要求咖啡供应商提前 60 天通知关税上调事宜
item.description: 据路透社看到的一份文件显示，销售美国顶级咖啡品牌麦斯威尔豪斯（Maxwell House）的食品制造商卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）已要求其咖啡供应商在因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税而涨价之前提前60天发出通知。【原文：Food maker Kraft Heinz , which sells top U.S. coffee brand Maxwell House, has asked its coffee suppliers for 60 days' notice before hiking prices due to U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, according to a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 分析师称勒索软件组织 Lockbit 似乎遭到黑客攻击
item.description: 据勒索团伙 Lockbit 的一个网站上的一个恶意帖子和跟踪该团伙的安全分析师称，该团伙背后的勒索赎金网络罪犯似乎也遭遇了一次漏洞。【原文：The ransom-seeking cybercriminals behind the extortion group Lockbit appear to have suffered a breach of their own, according to a rogue post to one of the group's websites and security analysts who follow the gang.】

item.title: Coinbase 季度利润因支出增加而下降
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Coinbase 周四报告称，由于成本上升，第一季度利润下降。【原文：Crypto exchange Coinbase reported a drop in first-quarter profit on Thursday as costs rose.】

item.title: 美国旅游需求疲软，Expedia 季度收入不及预期；股价下跌
item.description: 在线旅游平台 Expedia 周四未能达到华尔街对该公司季度收入的预期，原因是美国的需求弱于预期，该行业正准备应对消费者支出放缓带来的业绩下滑。【原文：Online travel platform Expedia missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, due to weaker than expected demand in the U.S., as the industry braces for a slowdown amid slower consumer spending.】
